channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Netflix’s Surprising New No. 2 Show Is An Overlooked Canadian Drama
item.description: Netflix has a new #2 show that has come out of nowhere to gain huge viewership on the service. What exactly is Sullivan's Crossing?

item.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 First Look: Breaking The Iterative Upgrade Cycle
item.description: The Galaxy Z Fold 7 is thinner, lighter, and finally feels like a regular phone. I tried it to break down all the key upgrades. HEre's what you need t...

item.title: Samsung Makes 24-Hour $190 Offer To Galaxy Z Fold 7 Buyers
item.description: Samsung silently drops 24-Hour Galaxy Z Fold 7 promo code.

item.title: Karen Read Trial: Expert Explains ‘Hos Long To Die In Cold’ Search And Deleted Calls
item.description: The trial’s most debated digital artifact was a Google search from Jen McCabe’s iPhone: “hos long to die in cold.”

item.title: Major New iPhone Update Means Calls And iMessage Will Never Be The Same Again
item.description: Users in the EU will shortly see an upgrade which will change how the iPhone works for calls and texts.

item.title: Publicity or public relations?

item.title: The future doesn’t care
item.description: It doesn’t care whether you’re excited or filled with trepidation. It arrives, regardless. What an opportunity. Or a threat. Up to us.

item.title: Not smart vs. stupid
